readable.title: 3410902181_b2a3c6eec9
readable.content: A child is performing with a toy while onstage with a colorful balloon backdrop . A girl in a blue leotard hula hoops on a stage with balloon shapes in the background . A little girl does a hula hoop behind a backdrop of balloons . A young girl hula dances in front of a colorful backdrop . Girl is performing onstage with a hula hoop surrounded by many balloons .
